title: The Big Bang Theory
overview: Leonard Hofstadter and Sheldon Cooper are brilliant physicists, the kind of "beautiful minds" that understand how the universe works. But none of that genius helps them interact with people, especially women. All this begins to change when a free-spirited beauty named Penny moves in next door. Sheldon, Leonard's roommate, is quite content spending his nights playing Klingon Boggle with their socially dysfunctional friends, fellow CalTech scientists Howard Wolowitz and Raj Koothrappali. However, Leonard sees in Penny a whole new universe of possibilities... including love.

episodes.title: The Hofstadter Insufficiency
episodes.overview: Sheldon and Penny share secrets while Leonard is away; Wolowitz helps Raj get over his ex.

episodes.title: The Deception Verification
episodes.overview: Leonard and Sheldon's friendship is tested; Wolowitz's relationship with his mom causes a threat to his masculinity.

episodes.title: The Scavenger Vortex
episodes.overview: Raj designs a scavenger hunt that brings out the best -- and the worst -- in the whole gang.

episodes.title: The Raiders Minimization
episodes.overview: Sheldon wants revenge after Amy ruins one of his favorite films; Leonard finds a way to get Penny to do anything; Stuart and Raj make online dating profiles.

episodes.title: The Workplace Proximity
episodes.overview: Sheldon and Amy's relationship is tested when she takes a job at his university; a fight with Bernadette leaves Howard sleeping on Raj's couch.

episodes.title: The Romance Resonance
episodes.overview: Sheldon’s major scientific breakthrough makes him feel like a fraud. Meanwhile, Howard’s romantic gesture to Bernadette causes Penny to step up her game with Leonard.

episodes.title: The Proton Displacement
episodes.overview: When Professor Proton asks Leonard for help with an experiment, Sheldon retaliates by befriending Proton's rival, Bill Nye.

episodes.title: The Itchy Brain Simulation
episodes.overview: When a mistake comes to light, Sheldon makes Leonard walk a mile in his shoes; Penny decides to confront Raj's ex.

episodes.title: The Thanksgiving Decoupling
episodes.overview: When the gang decides to spend Thanksgiving at Mrs. Wolowitz's house, Sheldon protests; Leonard and Penny deal with an error from her past.

episodes.title: The Discovery Dissipation
episodes.overview: Amy and Leonard try to help Sheldon deal with his shame; Raj stays with Bernadette and Howard for a week.

episodes.title: The Cooper Extraction
episodes.overview: While Sheldon is in Texas, the rest of the gang realize how much he has changed their lives as they decorate the apartment Christmas tree.

episodes.title: The Hesitation Ramification
episodes.overview: As Leonard tries to help Penny with a disappointment, Penny asks him a bold question about their relationship; Sheldon wants to learn how to be funny.

episodes.title: The Occupation Recalibration
episodes.overview: Sheldon must learn how to relax when he is forced to take a vacation; Leonard tries to support Penny when she quits her job; Bernadette needs to replace one of Stuart's comic books.

episodes.title: The Convention Conundrum
episodes.overview: Unable to get Comic-Con tickets, Sheldon tries to hold his own convention and ends up spending a wild evening with James Earl Jones; the ladies try to act maturely.

episodes.title: The Locomotive Manipulation
episodes.overview: Sheldon and Amy go on a trip to wine country with Howard and Bernadette; Penny and Leonard rush Raj's dog to the vet.

episodes.title: The Table Polarization
episodes.overview: Leonard buys a dining room table and it causes Sheldon to reevaluate the changes in his life. Meanwhile, Wolowitz is offered a chance to go back to space and Bernadette struggles with whether or not to encourage him.

episodes.title: The Friendship Turbulence
episodes.overview: After the insults fly, Bernadette tries to broker the peace between Wolowitz and Sheldon. Meanwhile, Penny is offered an embarrassing movie role and Raj asks Amy to write to a woman on his behalf.

episodes.title: The Mommy Observation
episodes.overview: When Sheldon visits his Mom in Houston, he is forced to confront a new reality. Meanwhile, Raj’s ‘Murder Mystery’ party starts some fights within the gang.

episodes.title: The Date Night Variable
episodes.overview: Raj faces his loneliness when his friends are out on dates; while in space, Wolowitz gets drawn into a fight between Bernadette and his mom.

episodes.title: The Decoupling Fluctuation
episodes.overview: Sheldon tries to intervene when he learns that Penny is thinking about breaking up with Leonard; Howard is picked on.

episodes.title: The Higgs Boson Observation
episodes.overview: Amy feels threatened by Sheldon's new assistant; Wolowitz starts to feel the pressures of being in space.

episodes.title: The Re-Entry Minimization
episodes.overview: Wolowitz's return from space isn't all he expected; game night becomes a gender war.

episodes.title: The Holographic Excitation
episodes.overview: The gang heads to Stuart's comic book store to celebrate Halloween; Leonard uses science to seduce Penny.

episodes.title: The Extract Obliteration
episodes.overview: A game threatens Sheldon's relationship with Stephen Hawking; Penny secretly signs up for a college class.

episodes.title: The Habitation Configuration
episodes.overview: Bernadette wants Wolowitz to move out of his mom's house; Sheldon is caught in the middle of Amy and Wil Wheaton's argument.

episodes.title: The 43 Peculiarity
episodes.overview: Raj and Howard try to to figure out why Sheldon disappears at 2:45 every afternoon; jealousy arises in Penny and Leonard's relationship.

episodes.title: The Parking Spot Escalation
episodes.overview: Sheldon and Wolowitz's fight over a parking spot at the university impacts the whole gang.

episodes.title: The Fish Guts Displacement
episodes.overview: When Amy gets sick, Sheldon tries to nurse her back to health; Wolowitz and his father-in-law plan a fishing trip.

episodes.title: The Santa Simulation
episodes.overview: During a game, Sheldon revisits Christmas memories; Amy, Penny and Bernadette look for a date for Koothrappali.

episodes.title: The Egg Salad Equivalency
episodes.overview: When Sheldon is accused of sexual harassment, he ends up getting Raj, Leonard and Wolowitz in trouble.

episodes.title: The Bakersfield Expedition
episodes.overview: As the guys don costumes and go on a road trip to a comic book convention, the ladies decide to stay home and try to interpret a comic book.

episodes.title: The Cooper/Kripke Inversion
episodes.overview: Sheldon faces a crisis of confidence when he is forced to work with his nemesis, Barry Kripke; Raj and Howard buy expensive action figures of themselves.

episodes.title: The Spoiler Alert Segmentation
episodes.overview: A fight between Sheldon and Leonard impacts Amy and Penny's living arrangements; while Howard is away, Raj helps Mrs. Wolowitz out.

episodes.title: The Tangible Affection Proof
episodes.overview: The guys search for a perfect Valentine's Day gift for their significant others; Stuart and Raj host a "lonely people" party at the comic book store.

episodes.title: The Monster Isolation
episodes.overview: After a bad date, Koothrappali decides to never leave his apartment; Penny's acting skills impress Sheldon.

episodes.title: The Contractual Obligation Implementation
episodes.overview: Leonard, Sheldon and Wolowitz talk to junior high girls about science-related careers; Raj plans a date with Lucy.

episodes.title: The Closet Reconfiguration
episodes.overview: Howard considers whether or not he should open a letter from his father; Penny and Leonard host a "grown-up" cocktail party.

episodes.title: The Tenure Turbulence
episodes.overview: The girls get involved when Leonard, Sheldon and Raj compete for tenure at the University.

episodes.title: The Closure Alternative
episodes.overview: Amy tries to help Sheldon get over his compulsive need for closure when one of his favorite TV shows is canceled; Raj discovers a secret about Lucy.

episodes.title: The Proton Resurgence
episodes.overview: Leonard and Sheldon hire the host (Bob Newhart) of their favorite childhood TV show to perform; Bernadette and Howard run into trouble while dog-sitting for Raj's pet.

episodes.title: The Love Spell Potential
episodes.overview: Amy and Sheldon's relationship takes a surprising turn during a game of "Dungeons & Dragons"; Lucy and Koothrappali have an awkward date.

episodes.title: The Bon Voyage Reaction
episodes.overview: When Leonard is considered for an exciting research opportunity, Sheldon becomes jealous and tries to scare him into backing out.  Meanwhile, Raj's relationship with Lucy is strained when he tries to get her to meet his friends.

episodes.title: The Skank Reflex Analysis
episodes.overview: Penny is worried with how damaged her friendship with the guys will be in the aftermath of her sleeping with Raj while Sheldon becomes the leader of the paintball team.

episodes.title: The Infestation Hypothesis
episodes.overview: A fight between Sheldon and Penny leaves Amy caught in the middle, while Leonard tries to spice up his long-distance relationship with Priya.

episodes.title: The Pulled Groin Extrapolation
episodes.overview: Leonard and Amy get to know each other better, while Howard and Bernadette spend the weekend with Mrs. Wolowitz.

episodes.title: The Wiggly Finger Catalyst
episodes.overview: Penny plays Matchmaker for Raj, which results in him finding a girl he is comfortable talking to.

episodes.title: The Russian Rocket Reaction
episodes.overview: Sheldon and Leonard get invited to a party at Wil Wheaton's house, and Howard gets an out-of-this-world opportunity.

episodes.title: The Rhinitis Revelation
episodes.overview: Sheldon's mother, Mary Cooper, comes to visit, but Sheldon is annoyed that she also spends time with the rest of the gang, instead of catering to his every demand.

episodes.title: The Good Guy Fluctuation
episodes.overview: A cute comic book artist puts Leonard and Priya’s relationship to the test, while Sheldon tries to scare the guys for Halloween.

episodes.title: The Isolation Permutation
episodes.overview: Amy becomes heartbroken when she discovers that Penny and Bernadette went wedding dress shopping without her.

episodes.title: The Ornithophobia Diffusion
episodes.overview: Leonard and Penny try hanging out as friends on a 'non-date', but end up purposely ruining each others chances with perspective dates. Meanwhile, Sheldon enlists the help of Bernadette and Amy to overcome his fear of birds.

episodes.title: The Flaming Spittoon Acquisition
episodes.overview: Sheldon considers taking his relationship with Amy to the next level when Stuart from the comic book store asks her out on a date.

episodes.title: The Speckerman Recurrence
episodes.overview: Leonard must face his fears after being contacted by his high school tormentor.

episodes.title: The Shiny Trinket Maneuver
episodes.overview: Sheldon gets in trouble with Amy when he isn't impressed by her recent accomplishment, and Howard must come to grips with Bernadette's dislike of children.

episodes.title: The Recombination Hypothesis
episodes.overview: Leonard, who broke up with Priya, asks Penny out to a spur-of the-moment romantic dinner for two, and the duo contemplates on their relationship.

episodes.title: The Beta Test Initiation
episodes.overview: Leonard and Penny deal with the idea of starting a relationship again and Raj finally finds a "woman" he can talk to without being drunk, in the form of Siri on his new phone. Meanwhile, Sheldon decides to start a YouTube series entitled "Sheldon Cooper presents Fun with Flags" with the help of Amy.

episodes.title: The Friendship Contraction
episodes.overview: Sheldon's selfish demands force Leonard to reconsider their friendship. Meanwhile, Wolowitz tries to pick his astronaut nickname.

episodes.title: The Vacation Solution
episodes.overview: When Sheldon is forced to take his vacation, he goes to work with Amy in her neurobiology lab.

episodes.title: The Rothman Disintegration
episodes.overview: Penny is horrified when Amy gives her a gift: a huge, quite horrible painting of the two of them. With no good way to avoid displaying it, she only hangs it up when Amy is over. When Amy catches her taking the painting down, she's embarrassed and angry until Penny lies and says the gift made Bernadette jealous. When the deranged Professor Rothman is forced to retire, both Sheldon and Kripke vie for his office. President Siebert refuses to resolve the dispute, so Leonard arranges a one-on-one basketball game to decide (since they're both equally bad at sports). Neither one can even make a single basket, so they end up deciding by seeing who can bounce the ball the highest. Sheldon wins; unfortunately, the office is not what he'd hoped for: the thermostat is located in the office of a professor going through the hot flashes of menopause (thus Sheldon is too cold), the mockingbird outside his window is off-key with the annoying windchimes, the perpetually naked Professor Rothman refuses to vacate, and the Geology Department upstairs makes too much noise. Finally, Sheldon gets his head stuck in the wall in an existing hole, after which Leonard takes his picture before he goes for help.

episodes.title: The Werewolf Transformation
episodes.overview: Sheldon becomes agitated when his regular barber is out sick. Astronaut training causes Howard to reconsider wanting to go into space. Penny beats Leonard in chess, the first time she plays.

episodes.title: The Weekend Vortex
episodes.overview: Sheldon must choose between joining Amy at her aunt's birthday party or playing videogames all weekend with the guys.

episodes.title: The Transporter Malfunction
episodes.overview: Penny buys Leonard and Sheldon “Star Trek” collectibles as a thank-you, leading Sheldon to be haunted by Mr. Spock. Meanwhile, Raj decides he has met the “Future Mrs. Koothrappali” after his parents set him up on a date.

episodes.title: The Hawking Excitation
episodes.overview: When Wolowitz gets to work with Stephen Hawking, Sheldon is willing to do anything to meet his hero.

episodes.title: The Stag Convergence
episodes.overview: After the guys throw Howard a bachelor party, Bernadette reconsiders marrying him after learning about his sexual history.

episodes.title: The Launch Acceleration
episodes.overview: When NASA moves up Howard's mission, he must face his fears and Bernadette's dad, thus putting the wedding plans in jeopardy. Meanwhile, Leonard says something surprising to Penny in the bedroom.

episodes.title: The Countdown Reflection
episodes.overview: The fifth season ends with Howard and Bernadette deciding to get married before his NASA mission, causing the gang to scurry into overdrive in an effort to stage the wedding. NASA astronaut Mike Massimino has a cameo as himself.

episodes.title: The Robotic Manipulation
episodes.overview: Penny tags along on Sheldon's first ever date; Wolowitz finds a new use for a robotic arm.

episodes.title: The Cruciferous Vegetable Amplification
episodes.overview: Realizing he will not live long enough to download his consciousness into a robot body, Sheldon tries to extend his life span.

episodes.title: The Zazzy Substitution
episodes.overview: The guys are concerned as Sheldon searches for an alternative to human companionship.

episodes.title: The Hot Troll Deviation
episodes.overview: An embarrassing secret of Wolowitz's comes to light, while Sheldon and Raj have a small war at work.

episodes.title: The Desperation Emanation
episodes.overview: Leonard realizes he’s the only one without a girlfriend, while Sheldon wants to get rid of his.

episodes.title: The Irish Pub Formulation
episodes.overview: Leonard keeps an affair a secret from Sheldon, Howard and Raj.

episodes.title: The Apology Insufficiency
episodes.overview: Sheldon's answers during an FBI interview put Wolowitz's security clearance in jeopardy.

episodes.title: The 21-Second Excitation
episodes.overview: While the guys camp in line for a long-awaited movie screening, Penny and Bernadette invite Amy to her first slumber party.

episodes.title: The Boyfriend Complexity
episodes.overview: Penny asks Leonard to lie to her father, while Howard, Raj and Bernadette pull an all-nighter at a telescope.

episodes.title: The Alien Parasite Hypothesis
episodes.overview: Amy finds she has sexual feelings for Penny's ex, while Koothrappali and Wolowitz try to prove who would be the better superhero.

episodes.title: The Justice League Recombination
episodes.overview: The guys find a "super" use for Penny's new boyfriend, Zack, when they enter a costume contest as the Justice League.

episodes.title: The Bus Pants Utilization
episodes.overview: Leonard's idea for a smartphone app derails his friendship with Sheldon.

episodes.title: The Love Car Displacement
episodes.overview: Bernadette runs into her ex-boyfriend while attending a science event with Wolowitz.

episodes.title: The Thespian Catalyst
episodes.overview: Hoping it will make him a better teacher, Sheldon has Penny give him acting lessons. Raj has fantasies about a friend's girlfriend.

episodes.title: The Benefactor Factor
episodes.overview: A wealthy donor to the university makes Leonard consider how far he's willing to go for the sake of science.

episodes.title: The Cohabitation Formulation
episodes.overview: As Wolowitz contemplates taking things with Bernadette to the next level, Leonard rekindles his relationship with Raj's sister.

episodes.title: The Toast Derivation
episodes.overview: Sheldon becomes concerned when everybody begins to hang out at Raj's apartment and discovers Leonard is the center of the group.

episodes.title: The Prestidigitation Approximation
episodes.overview: Sheldon is baffled by Wolowitz's magic trick. Meanwhile, Leonard realizes dating Priya may make it impossible to continue being friends with Penny.

episodes.title: The Zarnecki Incursion
episodes.overview: Sheldon's World of Warcraft online game account is hacked and he is determined to find out who did it. Also Penny shares some girl talk with her friends about Leonard and his new girlfriend. When Howard discovers who hacked the account, the guys depart for a quest to Carlsbad, California where the hacker, Todd Zarnecki, lives in order to retrieve the stolen account, along with "enchanted weapons, gladiator armor, gold, and a battle ostrich, Glenn". Despite Sheldon carrying his Bat'leth with him they fail miserably. On the way back their car engine breaks down, and they're saved by Penny, who came to drive them home and upon hearing about their failure promises to show them "How we finish quests in Nebraska" and forces Zarnecki to give up kicking him below waist.

episodes.title: The Herb Garden Germination
episodes.overview: Sheldon and Amy decide to start several rumors about the others as a test. Meanwhile, Howard takes his relationship with Bernadette to even higher level.

episodes.title: The Agreement Dissection
episodes.overview: When Leonard spends too much time in the shower with Priya, Sheldon charges Leonard with two violations of the roommate agreement. However, before he can get too far, Priya uses her skills as a lawyer to nullify the charges due to the agreement's vague wording, much to Sheldon's dismay. When the guys take advantage of Priya's skills in order to eat Greek food on pizza night, Sheldon goes to Penny, who invites him to a girls' night out with Amy and Bernadette, which Sheldon agrees to after Penny mentions that they may be talking trash about Priya. After the girls drink some cocktails, they decide to take Sheldon dancing, which Sheldon reluctantly goes along with. After dancing, Sheldon takes an intoxicated Amy back to her apartment and as well as talking about Priya, meets a monkey who is addicted to smoking cigarettes. Amy tells Sheldon not to give in to Priya's law skills, before kissing him and going to her bathroom to vomit.

episodes.title: The Wildebeest Implementation
episodes.overview: Raj attempts to cure his social anxiety disorder while Penny uses Bernadette to spy on Leonard and his girlfriend.

episodes.title: The Engagement Reaction
episodes.overview: When Howard finally breaks the news to his mom that he's engaged to Bernadette, it lands her in the hospital.

episodes.title: The Roommate Transmogrification
episodes.overview: When Bernadette receives her PhD, Wolowitz feels emasculated. Raj and Leonard swap places and Penny does something she's regrets.

episodes.title: The Electric Can Opener Fluctuation
episodes.overview: When Sheldon learns the guys tampered with his expedition data he got from the arctic, he leaves to Texas in disgrace. This results in the guys following him, which threatens Leonard's hope for some romantic time with Penny and the guys' friendship with Sheldon.

episodes.title: The Jiminy Conjecture
episodes.overview: Leonard and Penny struggle to recover from an awkward first hookup while Sheldon and Howard stake their best comic books on a bet to determine the species of a cricket.

episodes.title: The Gothowitz Deviation
episodes.overview: Howard and Raj visit a Goth nightclub to pick up women while Sheldon attempts to build a better Penny using chocolate-based behavior modification.

episodes.title: The Pirate Solution
episodes.overview: Raj must find a new job or be sent back to India, but Sheldon has a solution, which leaves Leonard and Penny dealing with Howard as a third wheel.

episodes.title: The Creepy Candy Coating Corollary
episodes.overview: After overhearing that Wil Wheaton is entering a trading-card competition, Sheldon decides to enter it himself. Meanwhile, Penny sets up one of her friends on a date with Wolowitz.

episodes.title: The Cornhusker Vortex
episodes.overview: Sheldon becomes Leonard's teacher in order to understand football, while an incident with flying a kite threatens Howard and Raj's friendship.

episodes.title: The Guitarist Amplification
episodes.overview: A squabble between Leonard and Penny sees Sheldon playing mediator, though out of his own incovenience from the sitiation rather than altruism.

episodes.title: The Adhesive Duck Deficiency
episodes.overview: With Leonard, Howard and Raj away camping in the desert, an injured Penny has only Sheldon to rely on.

episodes.title: The Vengeance Formulation
episodes.overview: After he's humiliated on National Public Radio, Sheldon vows to destroy Kripke, while Wolowitz tries not to destroy his new relationship with Bernadette.

episodes.title: The Gorilla Experiment
episodes.overview: Penny gets help from Sheldon in order to understand what Leonard's work is, while Wolowitz develops a jealousy when Leonard starts hanging out with his new girlfriend.

episodes.title: The Maternal Congruence
episodes.overview: A Christmas visit from his mother has Leonard discovering she's kept a lot of news from him that she shares with Sheldon and worrying if she'll approve of his romance with Penny.

episodes.title: The Psychic Vortex
episodes.overview: Leonard is aghast to find out a secret of Penny's: she believes in psychics. Meanwhile, Sheldon tries to assist Koothrappali in picking up a girl at a university mixer.

episodes.title: The Bozeman Reaction
episodes.overview: When their apartment is robbed, Leonard and Sheldon turn to their friends to create a state-of-the-art security system.

episodes.title: The Einstein Approximation
episodes.overview: Sheldon's search for the answer to a physics problem leads him to work at the Cheesecake Factory with Penny.

episodes.title: The Large Hadron Collision
episodes.overview: Leonard can only bring one guest on a trip to see CERN's Large Hadron Collider (the world's largest and highest energy particle accelerator) in Switzerland on Valentine's Day.

episodes.title: The Excelsior Acquisition
episodes.overview: Sheldon winds up in traffic court when he gets a ticket because of Penny.

episodes.title: The Precious Fragmentation
episodes.overview: When the guys find a ring from "The Lord of the Rings" at a garage sale, it threatens to tear them apart.

episodes.title: The Pants Alternative
episodes.overview: Sheldon's friends come to his aid when his fear of public speaking stands between him and a coveted award.

episodes.title: The Wheaton Recurrence
episodes.overview: A fight between Leonard and Penny threatens their relationship, while Sheldon battles Wil Wheaton in bowling.

episodes.title: The Spaghetti Catalyst
episodes.overview: When Leonard and Penny aren't speaking, Sheldon goes to extremes to keep them both happy.

episodes.title: The Plimpton Stimulation
episodes.overview: Leonard and Sheldon compete for the attention of a famous female physicist.

episodes.title: The Staircase Implementation
episodes.overview: Leonard tells Penny about how he met Sheldon for the first time...and what happened to the elevator.

episodes.title: The Lunar Excitation
episodes.overview: While Penny worries that dating Leonard has ruined her for normal guys, Wolowitz and Koothrappali search for Sheldon's perfect match online.

episodes.title: The Bad Fish Paradigm
episodes.overview: Penny's first date with Leonard goes awry; Penny finds Sheldon to be an unwilling confidant.

episodes.title: The Codpiece Topology
episodes.overview: A jealous Leonard reacts to Penny's new guy by rebounding with Leslie.

episodes.title: The Barbarian Sublimation
episodes.overview: Sheldon creates a monster when he introduces Penny to online gaming.

episodes.title: The Griffin Equivalency
episodes.overview: Raj gets an inflated ego and makes a play for Penny after being referenced in a magazine article.

episodes.title: The Euclid Alternative
episodes.overview: Leonard and his friends stage an intervention to force Sheldon to face his fear of driving.

episodes.title: The Cooper-Nowitzki Theorem
episodes.overview: Sheldon and the gang are confused when a young grad student is attracted to him.

episodes.title: The Panty Piñata Polarization
episodes.overview: When Sheldon bans Penny from the apartment for numerous minor infractions, she decides to retaliate.

episodes.title: The Lizard-Spock Expansion
episodes.overview: Leonard inadvertently steals away the new woman Wolowitz thinks is the love of his life.

episodes.title: The White Asparagus Triangulation
episodes.overview: Sheldon is thrilled when Leonard starts dating a woman who meets Sheldon's stringent standards.

episodes.title: The Vartabedian Conundrum
episodes.overview: Leonard asks Penny for advice when his new relationship starts moving too fast.

episodes.title: The Bath Item Gift Hypothesis
episodes.overview: Penny starts dating Leonard's handsome colleague; Leonard and his friends are tortured by Sheldon's obsession with gift-giving etiquette.

episodes.title: The Killer Robot Instability
episodes.overview: Penny's criticism of Wolowitz's romantic life pushes him into depression and AWOL for a fighting robot battle the rest of guys are depending on him for.

episodes.title: The Friendship Algorithm
episodes.overview: Sheldon creates a scientific procedure for making friends.

episodes.title: The Financial Permeability
episodes.overview: Sheldon's solution to Penny's financial difficulty leads to a confrontation between Leonard and Penny's ex-boyfriend.

episodes.title: The Maternal Capacitance
episodes.overview: Leonard and Penny are drawn together after a disastrous visit from Leonard's mother.

episodes.title: The Cushion Saturation
episodes.overview: A paintball game leads to a fight between Sheldon and Penny, and romance for Leslie and Wolowitz.

episodes.title: The Terminator Decoupling
episodes.overview: Leonard, Sheldon and Wolowitz are ecstatic to learn that a famous science-fiction actress (Summer Glau) is on board the train they are taking to San Francisco.

episodes.title: The Work Song Nanocluster
episodes.overview: Penny's home business turns into a complete nightmare when Sheldon takes over.

episodes.title: The Dead Hooker Juxtaposition
episodes.overview: Penny squares off with a new beautiful female neighbor who may become the building's "new Penny."

episodes.title: The Hofstadter Isotope
episodes.overview: A fellow comic book enthusiast's hitting on Penny leads to Leonard and Howard going to a bar's Ladies' Night.

episodes.title: The Vegas Renormalization
episodes.overview: Leonard and Koothrappali escort a heartbroken Wolowitz to Las Vegas, and Sheldon becomes locked out of his apartment and must stay with Penny.

episodes.title: The Classified Materials Turbulence
episodes.overview: Penny's second date with Stuart sees her making a comment that gives Leonard new hope for a relationship with her. Wolowitz realizes there's a crucial error in a NASA project he's working on.

episodes.title: The Monopolar Expedition
episodes.overview: The guys' plan to work over the summer at the North Pole makes Penny revaluate her feelings for Leonard.

episodes.title: Pilot
episodes.overview: Brilliant physicist roommates Leonard and Sheldon meet their new neighbor Penny, who begins showing them that as much as they know about science, they know little about actual living.

episodes.title: The Big Bran Hypothesis
episodes.overview: Leonard volunteers to sign for a package in an attempt to make a good impression on Penny, but when he enlists Sheldon for help, his attempt at chivalry goes terribly awry.

episodes.title: The Fuzzy Boots Corollary
episodes.overview: Leonard asks a woman out after he finds out that Penny is seeing someone.

episodes.title: The Luminous Fish Effect
episodes.overview: Sheldon's getting fired forces him to explore what life has to offer outside physics, leaving Leonard to take drastic action to snap his friend out of his funk.

episodes.title: The Hamburger Postulate
episodes.overview: Fearing he's wasting his time on Penny, Leonard ends up making a connection with Leslie.

episodes.title: The Middle Earth Paradigm
episodes.overview: Penny hosts a Hallowe'en party, putting Leonard, Sheldon, Wolowitz, and Koothrappali through a new test of their social skills.

episodes.title: The Dumpling Paradox
episodes.overview: With Wolowitz AWOL with one of her friends, Penny's recruited to fill in for him on the guys' Halo team

episodes.title: The Grasshopper Experiment
episodes.overview: Raj's parents set him up on a blind date, but just when he discovers he can talk to her, she shows interest in Sheldon.

episodes.title: The Cooper-Hofstadter Polarization
episodes.overview: When they're invited to present at a physics conference, Sheldon's reluctance to share the credit leads to a tiff between him and  Leonard, and Penny's intervention only exacerbates the situation.

episodes.title: The Loobenfeld Decay
episodes.overview: Leonard and Sheldon each lie to avoid seeing Penny's concert, but Sheldon's is a bit too complicated for his own good.

episodes.title: The Pancake Batter Anomaly
episodes.overview: With his friends knowing how sour he acts when sick—and avoiding him as a result—Sheldon is nursed by Penny, who hasn't a clue what she's in for.

episodes.title: The Jerusalem Duality
episodes.overview: With Sheldon rattled over meeting Dennis, a 15-year-old physicist who's smarter than he, Leonard helps him look for a way to debunk Dennis's research.

episodes.title: The Bat Jar Conjecture
episodes.overview: Sheldon finds himself booted from the gang's Physics Bowl team and replaced with Leslie, so he forms his own team, hoping to prove he's superior.

episodes.title: The Nerdvana Annihilation
episodes.overview: When delivery of another collectible leads to Penny's lashing out at Leonard, he decides it's time to give up his habit, much to his friends' protestation.

episodes.title: The Pork Chop Indeterminacy
episodes.overview: The rest of the gang fall for Sheldon's twin sister, and Leonard's plan to win her heart is derailed when Sheldon declares he'll be the one to decide who can date her.

episodes.title: The Peanut Reaction
episodes.overview: Penny wants to throw a surprise party for Leonard, but Sheldon's indulgence at an electronics store throws her off-track.

episodes.title: The Tangerine Factor
episodes.overview: Penny's break-up spurs Leonard to summon the courage to ask her out, and each goes to Sheldon for advice on their upcoming date.

episodes.title: Unaired Pilot
episodes.overview: The very first pilot of The Big Bang Theory. With a person call Katie played by Amanda Walsh, and a female friend called Gilda (Iris Bahr)

episodes.title: Access All Areas
episodes.overview:
Celebrating the 100th episode of US sitcom The Big Bang Theory, Rick Edwards travels to the Hollywood set for an access-all-areas visit, catching up with the cast and learning everything there is to know about the show.

This behind-the-scenes special takes fans through everything from the writing of the script to the recording of the show in front of a live audience.

episodes.title: It All Started With A Big Bang
episodes.overview:
Celebrating the 100th episode of The Big Bang Theory, Rick Edwards looks back at some of the US sitcom's most hilarious and memorable scenes and talks with the cast and crew on the set in Hollywood.

The actors share their favourite moments and reveal a few secrets about the making of the show.
